scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run app:react" "npm run app:vue" "npm run app:svelte"
scripts.preview: cp shared.css react-docs/src/ && cp shared.css vue-docs/src/assets && cp shared.css svelte-docs/src && vite build --watch & vite preview --open --port 3000 & npm run start:all
scripts.build-react: cd react-docs && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p dist && cp -r react-docs/build/* dist/react/
